com.pump.animation.capture

Class RobotScreenCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.animation.capture.ScreenCapture
      • com.pump.animation.capture.RobotScreenCapture

  • public class RobotScreenCapture
extends ScreenCapture
    This is an implementation of ScreenCapture that uses the java.awt.Robot class to capture the screen contents.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.pump.animation.capture.ScreenCapture

        tempDir

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RobotScreenCapture()
      Creates a new RobotScreenCapture object that will capture the entire screen.
      RobotScreenCapture(java.awt.Rectangle screenBounds)
      Creates a new RobotScreenCapture object that will capture the bounds provided.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.io.File capture(java.awt.Rectangle r)
      This uses the Robot class and ImageIO to record a snapshot of the screen to a PNG file.

      • RobotScreenCapture

        public RobotScreenCapture()
                   throws java.awt.AWTException
        Creates a new RobotScreenCapture object that will capture the entire screen.

      • RobotScreenCapture

        public RobotScreenCapture(java.awt.Rectangle screenBounds)
                   throws java.awt.AWTException
        Creates a new RobotScreenCapture object that will capture the bounds provided.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • capture

        protected java.io.File capture(java.awt.Rectangle r)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This uses the Robot class and ImageIO to record a snapshot of the screen to a PNG file.
        Specified by:
        capture in class ScreenCapture
        Parameters:
        r - the rectangle to capture
        Returns:
        a file representing the image captured. This should be of a "normal" image format (PNG, JPEG, etc.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
